description:
It`s the one-year anniversary of Tsumugi`s mom`s death, and she and daddy go to the countryside to attend the funeral.  On the night after they get back, daddy`s too tired to cook, so they go to an okonomiyaki restaraunt.  But Tsumugi throws a fit when she finds out it`s not what she thought.  Kotori offers to make her real okonomiyaki to make her feel better.  This time the whole gang drops in, even Kotori`s mom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: あいじょーたっぷりお好み焼き
